rules.description: Press left_command twice to send Ctrl+L (Focus Address Bar in Browser)

manipulators.description: to_delayed_action is set to 400ms in karabiner.json

rules.description: (Evan's Vim 1/11) j+k -> on, j+k, esc, control+[ or any pointing_button -> off
(Vim 2/11) finger on trackpad + any key -> off
Post escape if caps is pressed alone, left_ctrl otherwise
Post left_ctrl when return_or_enter is hold.
Numeric Keypad Mode [Tab as trigger key]
Quit application by pressing command-q twice
